dex_arm_text_raw: Dexmedetomidine infusion (0.5 μg/kg/h) during surgery and up to 2 hours in the recovery room.
Dexmedetomidine 2.5mcg IV bolus PCA lockout 8 min, background infusion of 1.25mcg/h
Dexmedetomidine 0.4mcg/kg bolus over 15 minutes before induction, 0.1mcg/kg/h infusion until 1h before end of surgery
Arm 1: Dexmedetomidine 0.04 mg/mL intravenous bolus, infusion 0.4 μg/kg/h | Arm 3: Dexmedetomidine intravenous bolus 0.04 mg/mL, infusion 0.4 μg/kg/h+40mg atorvastatin daily
Arm 1: Dexmedetomidine 1 mcg/kg 10 minute IV bolus, continuous infusion 0.5 mcg/kg/h.
Arm 1: Dexmedetomidine 1 μg/kg bolus followed by 0.2 to 0.7 μg/kg/h infusion. | Arm 3: Dexmedetomidine 1 μg/kg bolus
Dexmedetomidine iv bolus 0.6 μg/kg for 10 minutes, 0.4 μg/k/h intraop, 0.1mcg.kg.h postop until extubation
Dexmedetomidine (0·6 μg/kg) bolus, infusion 0·125 ml per kg per h (0·5 μg per kg per h)
Dexmedetomidine 0.6 mg/k 10 minute IV bolus, continuous infusion then 0.4 mg/kg/h
Dexmedetomidine 0.5 mcg/kg 10 minute IV bolus, continuous infusion then 0.4 mcg/kg/h
Dexmedetomidine 0.5 μg.kg−1 bolus, maintenance infusion 0.2 μg.kg−1.hr−1
Dexmedetomidine bolus 0.5 μg/kg IV, maintenance 0.2 μg/kg per hour
Arm 1: Dexmedetomidine 1mcg/kg, infusion 0.5mcg/kg/h. | Arm 4: Dexmedetomidine 1mcg/kg, infusion 0.5mcg/kg/h + Ketamine 0.5mg/kg
Dexmedetomidine 1 μg/kg bolus, infusion of 0.2-0.7 μg/kg/h
Dexmedetomidine (1 μg/kg over 40 min), maximal dose of 80 μg
Arm 1: Dexmedetomidine 0.3 μg/kg/h. | Arm 3: Dexmedetomidine 0.6 μg/kg/h
Dexmedetomidine 0.1mcg/kg/h induction, 0.2 on CPB, 0.4 in ICU. Stopped by 24hours.
Dexmedetomidine intravenous bolus 0.6 μg kg−1 then 0.4 μg.kg−1.h−1
Dexmedetomidine 0.5 μg/kg dexmedetomidine over 10 minutes before anesthesia induction, continuous infusion of 0.4 μg/kg/h until 30 minutes before the end of surgery
Dexmedetomidine(4μg/mL) : 0.5μg/kg/hr infusion for 1 hour before operation is completed and 0.2-0.7μg/kg/hr infusion continuously until 6:00am the next day
Dexmedetomidine 1 mcg/kg 10 minute IV bolus, continuous infusion then 0.2 mcg/kg/h
